Html:
Hello.

I try to develop feature for saving the data from charts to the Excel.

For this purpose I want to change legend (user can select the lines for saving) and default context menu (add new command "Export selected to MS Excel").

The CheckBoxes was added into class LegendItem, but a mouse event doesn't handle. Is it possible to make event independent Legend? How to do this?

 

With best regards, Alexander.
